dcterms:description: The FF-Matterport dataset contains large and diverse missing regions formed by a free-form 3D mask generation algorithm that mimics human drawing trajectories in 3D space, specifically designed for the 3D scene inpainting task.
dcterms:title: FF-Matterport

dcterms:creator: Angel Chang
Angela Dai

Matthias Niessner
Manolis Savva
Shuran Song
Andy Zeng
Yinda Zhang
dcterms:description: The Matterport3D dataset is utilized for generating free-form masks in the FF-Matterport dataset, providing RGB-D data in indoor environments.
dcterms:title: Matterport3D
